JOIN STREETVEST AND GET INVOLVED WITH THEIR EVENT, TRYCYCLE!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Get involved this Easter with StreetInvest's event 'TryCycle,' an action packed afternoon full of free activities with bikes and scooters! StreetInvest are looking for grads across London to volunteer and help them run this day as well as promoting The Challenge Network!
The day will consist of bike and scooter circuit riding, family favourite giant games, bmx and skateboard half pipe, facepainting and much more! Come along on the 10th April to help StreetInvest run the day!
If you are interested in attending and volunteering please sign up here!
Details:
- When? Sunday 10th April 12:00pm - 16:00pm
- Where? The Embankment, Twickenham Riverside
- If you are participating in the Duke of Edinburgh, this volunteering event may count towards it!
Feel free to email us on tcs.westlondon@the-challenge.org if you have any questions or queries.
Ola Awosika
Graduate Programme Associate Manager - South West London
